testCases.label: Verify AppComponent initialization
testCases.description: Ensures that the Angular TestBed successfully creates an instance of AppComponent.

testCases.label: Verify AppComponent title
testCases.description: Checks that the AppComponent sets its title property to the string 'components'.

testCases.label: Verify nested component rendering
testCases.description: Ensures that the <app-my-first-component> selector is present in the AppComponent template and renders successfully.
